org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.presenter

Interface Presenter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CreateNewPackagePresenter, EditPackageContentsPresenter, HomepagePresenter, OpenExistingPackagePresenter, PackageGenerationPresenter, PackageMetadataPresenter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePresenterImpl, CreateNewPackagePresenterImpl, EditPackageContentsPresenterImpl, HomepagePresenterImpl, OpenExistingPackagePresenterImpl, PackageGenerationPresenterImpl, PackageMetadataPresenterImpl

    public interface Presenter
    A presenter displays and updates a View in response to user actions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears out the presenter information.
      javafx.scene.Node display()
      Called every time the user navigates to the presenter.
      Controller getController()
      Getter and setter methods needed for every presenter.
      void setController(Controller controller) 
      void setInternalProperties(InternalProperties internalProperties)
      Sets the internal properties object to use for the presenter.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        javafx.scene.Node display()
        Called every time the user navigates to the presenter.
        Returns:
        a node which displays the presenter view.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears out the presenter information.

      • getController

        Controller getController()
        Getter and setter methods needed for every presenter. The controller handles navigation between views and presenters, as well as storing any state information of the package generation process.
        Returns:
        the Controller

      • setController

        void setController(Controller controller)

      • setInternalProperties

        void setInternalProperties(InternalProperties internalProperties)
        Sets the internal properties object to use for the presenter. InternalProperties is a helper class that loads strings from the internal properties resource bundle.
        Parameters:
        internalProperties - the InternalProperties object
